name: next-wednesday
description: A compact, zero-dependency library that constructs Next.js 13+ App Route Handlers from decorated classes

scripts.test: npm run lint-pure && tsc --noemit && npm run unit
scripts.unit: PORT=3210 concurrently "npm run test:unit" "npm run serve:unit" --kill-others --success first
scripts.build: rm -r dist && npm run toc && tsc
scripts.patch: npm t && npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.minor: npm t && npm version minor && npm run build && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.BREAKING-major: npm t && npm version major && npm run build && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.beta-prepatch: npm t && npm version prepatch --preid=beta && npm run build && npm publish --tag beta && git push && git push --tags
scripts.beta-preminor: npm t && npm version preminor --preid=beta && npm run build && npm publish --tag beta && git push && git push --tags
scripts.BREAKING-beta-premajor: npm t && npm version premajor --preid=beta && npm run build && npm publish --tag beta && git push && git push --tags

author: Andrii Gubanov
